Title: Webcoda SharePoint RSS Rotator Web Part
Description: RSS Rotator Webpart using JQuery to display items from RSS Feeds with scrolling and rotating effects. Works with external and internal SharePoint RSS feeds thus allowing you to publish any list in SharePoint.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Add some interest to your SharePoint pages by adding scrolling news, announcements, obituaries or anything else that may be of interest.
More info here - http://www.sharepointsydney.com.au/resources/webparts/sharepoint-rss-rotator.aspx
